templateData.disclaimer:
How would you build more engaging relationships with customers and colleagues?

1-minute-me is a chat platform (chatbot) that helps you build conversations that deliver measurable results - both strategic and tactical. Hereâ€™s a (growing) list of things you can do on the platform:
